div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 236 Dodona, Epirus, 1959 Burial: 168-167 B.C. (Franke) Contents: 8 AR Epirote Rep.: 2 didr. (as Franke 2-3, 7) 2 dr. (cf. F. 47, 72) 2 third-st. (cf. F. 322, 361) Dyrrhachium: 1 dr. (as BMC 98) Acarnania: 1 dr. (as SNGCop. 419) Disposition: Jannina Dacaris, A Delt 1961-2, Chronika, p. 198, illus. Franke, Epirus, p. 30, note 14
